definitions.body: :Nu 13:23 cluster (Eth. 0ask4l: Ar. 0’i3ka0lun, Aram. [[אִיתְכְּלָא]]; etym. dub.; Thes MV sub √ [[שׁכל]], but no suitable meaning proven; Sta:§ 258; 300 der. fr. √ [[אשׁך]] c. afformat. [[ל]])—´[[א]] abs. Nu 13:24 +; cstr. v:Nu 13:23 +; pl. [[אַשְׁכּׂלוֹת]] Ct So 7:8; cstr. [[אַשְׁכְּלֽת]] De 32:32, [[אֶשְׁכְּלוֹת]] Ct So 7:9; sf. [[אַשְׁכְּלֽתֶיהָ]] Ge 40:10; —

cluster of grapes, [[עֲנׇבִים]] ´[[א]] Nu 13:23 cf. v:Nu 13:24; vid. also Ge 40:10 [[הִבְשִׁילוּ]] [[עֲנׇבִים]] ´[[א]] its clusters ripened grapes; hence fig. of deeds of enemies of Israel, clusters of gall have they De 32:32 (‖[[עִנְבֵי רוֹשׁ]]); fig. of Isr. Is 65:8 ´[[יִמָּחֵא הַתִּירוֹשׁ בְּא]]; Mic 7:1 [[אֵין אֶשְׁכּוֹל לֶאֱכוֹל]] fig. of desolation of Israel under Yahweh's judgment; Ct So 7:9 in sim. [[שָׁדַיִח כְּאֶשְׁכְּלוֹת הַגֶּפֶן]] cf. v:So 7:8 (where Thes MV think of clusters of dates, v. [[תָּמָר]] palm-tree, ib.)
cluster of henna-flowers, [[הַכּׂפֶר]] ´[[א]] (v. [[כפר]]), metaph. of the beloved one Ct So 1:14. (Cf. Grünwald:Israel. Letterbode, Amst., xi. 148 f.)
